Summary: 5 red lights hovering in the sky over Spring Valley, CA.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Spring Valley
There were no other sightings in Spring Valley on or around July 4th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were watching the July 4th fireworks and to the east we noticed five, then four, red lights in the sky. They were in sort of a triangle formation. The lights were steady in the sky, not moving. They were red like planets. There were no other colors or blinking lights. They appeared to be at the same level as the stars. They didn't get closer or further away, but disappeared after about twenty minutes.
